ing: 2 (16 ounce) packages beef frankfurters, cut into bite size pieces
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer
des: "These dogs are made with beer and brown sugar, but are always a big hit with our friends and family. They should simmer on the stove for at least 60 minutes. We usually put them in a slow cooker when serving to keep them hot. Use toothpicks to spear these little bit-sized delights."
ins: In a medium saucepan, place the frankfurters, brown sugar and beer. Bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer at least 1 hour.
